short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your YouTube into a Netflix-style experience with cinematic video previews and an immersive browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üé¨  Cinematic helps you discover your next binge-worthy videos effortlessly with a sleek, distraction-free interface and auto-playing previews. It redefines how you explore content, making every interaction more engaging and fun.

‚Ä¢ Distraction-free: A clean interface with no shorts, banners, or unnecessary clutter.

‚ù§Ô∏è  Why You‚Äôll Love It
Cinematic is perfect for anyone who loves the simplicity and elegance of Netflix's browsing experience but wants to explore YouTube‚Äôs endless variety of content. It turns endless scrolling into a fun and engaging way to discover your next favorite videos.
